articles.content: You might finally have a good reason to use the web browser on your console for more than the bare necessities. The Vergereports that Microsoft has started testing a version of its Chromium-based Edg… [+904 chars]

articles.title: PS5 Restock Updates for Amazon, Antonline, GameStop, Target, Walmart and More - Newsweek
articles.description: Sony's next-gen PlayStation consoles remain unavailable at most retailers in the U.S. after several retailers restocked their supplies last week.
